message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll take 80% and you can have 20%.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, Alice. How about we split it 40/60?
I'm not sure I'm ready to give up 40% of the pot just yet, Bob. Can you meet me in the middle at 50/50?
I'll meet you at 55/45, Bob. It's a fair compromise, don't you think?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Alice. Let's split it 50/50 and call it a day!
